member.summary: Display name for the API key.

member.summary: The API key value. This is the Bearer token.

member.summary: Whether the API key is active.

member.summary: Whether this is an admin API key with full permissions.

member.exception: Thrown when name is null or empty.

member.summary: Create a redacted copy of the API key (for display purposes).

member.name: P:NetLedger.Balance.EntryGUID
member.summary: Entry GUID containing the latest balance entry.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Balance.CreatedUtc
member.summary: UTC timestamp when the account was created.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Balance.BalanceTimestampUtc
member.summary: UTC timestamp when the most recent balance was calculated.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Balance.CommittedBalance
member.summary: Committed balance available in the account. This balance does not include pending debits and credits.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Balance.PendingBalance
member.summary: Pending balance in the account. This balance includes pending credits and debits.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Balance.PendingCredits
member.summary: Pending credits. These transactions are not reflected in the committed balance.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Balance.PendingDebits
member.summary: Pending debits. These transactions are not reflected in the committed balance.

member.name: T:NetLedger.BatchEntryInput
member.summary: Represents input data for a batch entry operation (credit or debit).

member.name: P:NetLedger.BatchEntryInput.Amount
member.summary: Amount for the entry. Must be a non-negative value.

member.name: P:NetLedger.BatchEntryInput.Notes
member.summary: Optional notes or description for the entry. Can be null.

member.name: M:NetLedger.BatchEntryInput.#ctor
member.summary: Instantiate a batch entry input with default values.

member.name: M:NetLedger.BatchEntryInput.#ctor(System.Decimal,System.String)
member.summary: Instantiate a batch entry input with the specified amount and notes.
member.param: Amount for the entry. Must be non-negative.
Optional notes or description for the entry.
member.exception: Thrown when amount is negative.

member.summary: Abstract base class for database drivers. Derived classes must initialize the implementation methods.

member.summary: Action to invoke when logging queries.

member.summary: Database driver base class. Derived classes must initialize the implementation methods.
member.exception: Thrown when settings is null.

member.summary: Log a query if logging is enabled.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Database.DatabaseSettings.Hostname
member.summary: Database hostname (for MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server). Default is "localhost".

member.name: P:NetLedger.Database.DatabaseSettings.Port
member.summary: Database port. Default values: MySQL=3306, PostgreSQL=5432, SQL Server=1433. Value must be between 1 and 65535.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Database.DatabaseSettings.LogQueries
member.summary: Enable query logging. Default is false.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Database.DatabaseSettings.RequireEncryption
member.summary: Require encryption for database connections. Default is false.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Database.DatabaseSettings.ConnectionTimeoutSeconds
member.summary: Connection timeout in seconds. Default is 30 seconds. Must be between 1 and 300.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Database.DatabaseSettings.MaxPoolSize
member.summary: Maximum connection pool size. Default is 100. Must be between 1 and 500.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Database.DatabaseSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Instantiate database settings with defaults. Default configuration is SQLite with filename "./netledger.db".

member.name: M:NetLedger.Database.DatabaseSettings.GetDefaultPort
member.summary: Get the default port for the configured database type.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Database.DatabaseSettings.GetEffectivePort
member.summary: Get the effective port (uses default if port is 0).

member.summary: Start time UTC filter (created on or after).

member.summary: End time UTC filter (created on or before).

member.summary: Exclude balance entries. Default is true.

member.summary: Maximum number of results to return. Minimum value is 1. Maximum value is 1000. Default value is 1000.

member.summary: Create a filter builder from an enumeration query.

member.summary: Build the WHERE clause conditions for entries (without WHERE keyword).

member.summary: Build the WHERE clause conditions for accounts (without WHERE keyword).

member.summary: Sanitize a string for SQL injection prevention.

member.name: T:NetLedger.Entry
member.summary: An entry in the ledger for a given account.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Entry.Replaces
member.summary: Specifies the GUID of the entry that this entry is replacing. Used only by balance entries.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Entry.IsCommitted
member.summary: Indicates if the entry has been committed to the ledger and is reflected in the current balance.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Entry.CommittedByGUID
member.summary: GUID of the entry that committed this entry.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Entry.CommittedUtc
member.summary: UTC timestamp when the entry was committed.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Entry.CreatedUtc
member.summary: UTC timestamp when the entry was created.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Entry.#ctor(System.Guid,NetLedger.EntryType,System.Decimal,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Guid},System.Boolean)
member.param: GUID of the entry that summarized this entry.
Indicate whether or not the entry has already been included in the balance of the account.
member.exception: Thrown when accountGuid is empty.
Thrown when amount is negative.

member.name: T:NetLedger.EntryType
member.summary: The type of entry in the ledger.

member.name: T:NetLedger.EnumerationQuery
member.summary: Object used to request enumeration of accounts or entries. When enumerating accounts, AccountGUID should be null. When enumerating entries, AccountGUID must be specified.

member.name: P:NetLedger.EnumerationQuery.AccountGUID
member.summary: Account GUID. Required when enumerating entries within an account. Should be null when enumerating accounts.

member.name: P:NetLedger.EnumerationQuery.MaxResults
member.summary: Maximum number of results to retrieve. Minimum value is 1, maximum value is 1000. Default value is 1000.

member.name: P:NetLedger.EnumerationQuery.Skip
member.summary: The number of records to skip. Minimum value is 0. Default value is 0.

member.name: P:NetLedger.EnumerationQuery.ContinuationToken
member.summary: Continuation token for pagination. When provided, Skip should not be used.

member.name: P:NetLedger.EnumerationQuery.SearchTerm
member.summary: Search term to filter results. When enumerating accounts, filters by account name. When enumerating entries, filters by entry description.

member.name: P:NetLedger.EnumerationQuery.CreatedAfterUtc
member.summary: Only include records created on or after this timestamp UTC.

member.name: P:NetLedger.EnumerationQuery.CreatedBeforeUtc
member.summary: Only include records created on or before this timestamp UTC.

member.name: P:NetLedger.EnumerationQuery.AmountMinimum
member.summary: Only include entries with an amount greater than or equal to this value. Applicable only when enumerating entries.

member.name: P:NetLedger.EnumerationQuery.AmountMaximum
member.summary: Only include entries with an amount less than or equal to this value. Applicable only when enumerating entries.

member.name: P:NetLedger.EnumerationQuery.BalanceMinimum
member.summary: Only include accounts with a committed balance greater than or equal to this value. Applicable only when enumerating accounts.

member.name: P:NetLedger.EnumerationQuery.BalanceMaximum
member.summary: Only include accounts with a committed balance less than or equal to this value. Applicable only when enumerating accounts.

member.name: T:NetLedger.EnumerationResult`1
member.summary: Object returned as the result of an enumeration.

member.name: P:NetLedger.EnumerationResult`1.Success
member.summary: Indicates if the statistics operation was successful.

member.name: P:NetLedger.EnumerationResult`1.MaxResults
member.summary: Maximum number of results to retrieve.

member.name: P:NetLedger.EnumerationResult`1.RecordsRemaining
member.summary: Number of candidate records remaining in the enumeration.

member.name: E:NetLedger.Ledger.AccountCreated
member.summary: Event fired when an account is created.

member.name: E:NetLedger.Ledger.AccountDeleted
member.summary: Event fired when an account is deleted.

member.name: E:NetLedger.Ledger.CreditAdded
member.summary: Event fired when a credit is added.

member.name: E:NetLedger.Ledger.DebitAdded
member.summary: Event fired when a debit is added.

member.name: E:NetLedger.Ledger.EntryCanceled
member.summary: Event fired when an entry is canceled.

member.name: E:NetLedger.Ledger.EntriesCommitted
member.summary: Event fired when entries are committed successfully.

member.summary: Get entries for an account with optional filtering.
